title: Fluffy Pancakes
instructions:
Step 1: In a bowl combine 1 cup of flour, 1 heaping teaspoon of baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon of salt, 1 large egg, 1 cup of milk, and 2 tablespoons of melted butter. Mix the ingredients together until just combined.

Step 2: Grease a non-stick skillet over low-medium heat. Ladle a scoop of the pancake batter onto the skillet and spread the batter into a circular shape, about 4 inches in diameter.

Step 3: Cook the pancake for 2-3 minutes or until the bottom starts to become golden and small bubbles appear on the surface of the pancake.

Step 4: Flip the pancake and continue cooking for an additional 1-2 minutes.

Step 5: Repeat steps 2-4 with the remaining pancake batter.

Step 6: Serve hot pancakes with your favorite toppings such as butter, syrup, honey, jam, etc. Enjoy!

title: Grapes and Bagel Breakfast
instructions:
Step 1: Begin by preheating oven to 375°F (190°C).

Step 2: Slice the bagel in half and put onto a baking sheet, then bake in the oven for 5-8 minutes until it is lightly toasted.

Step 3: Slice a handful of grapes into small pieces.

Step 4: Remove the toasted bagel from the oven and spread each half with a thin layer of ricotta cheese.

Step 5: Top the ricotta cheese with the sliced grapes.

Step 6: Put back into the oven and bake for an additional 5 minutes until the grapes begin to soften and the cheese melts. 

Step 7: Remove from the oven and serve hot. Enjoy your Grapes and Bagel Breakfast!
